      • isPaintBorder

        public boolean isPaintBorder()
        Returns a boolean indicating if the border with the specified border color, should be painted. Applies only to candlesticks and histograms and is explicitly set although it could be deduced setting the border color to null.
        Returns:
        A boolean that indicates if the border color should be painted.

      • setPaintBorder

        public void setPaintBorder(boolean paintBorder)
        Set a boolean indicating if the border with the specified border color, should be painted. Applies only to candlesticks and histograms and is explicitly set although it could be deduced setting the border color to null.
        Parameters:
        paintBorder - A boolean that indicates if the border color should be painted.
